TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed TrueTypeFontMode extends System.Enum

summary.span: 指定打印机对格式为 TrueType 字体的文本的处理方式。

span.span: Specifies how a printer handles text that is formatted with a TrueType font.

remarks.format: ## Remarks TrueType 字体是*矢量*字体，指示打印机驱动程序和屏幕驱动程序如何绘制并填充字母的形状。TrueType fonts are *vector* fonts, which instruct printer drivers and screen drivers how to draw the shapes of the letters and fill them in. 矢量字体相对于*光栅*字体，只是列表。Vector fonts contrast with *raster* fonts, which are simply lists. 光栅字体具有每个可用字体大小的每个字母的列表，列表将确定是否打印该字母的每个像素。A raster font has a list for each letter of each available font size, and the lists determine, for every pixel in the letter, whether it prints. 您可以放大或缩小矢量字体，使其几乎为任何点大小;但是，矢量字体会降低打印速度，因为它们占用大量的打印机内存。You can enlarge or reduce vector fonts to almost any point size; however, vector fonts can slow printing because they occupy a large amount of printer memory. 此外，某些打印机不支持 TrueType 字体。Also, some printers do not support TrueType fonts. 较新的打印机通常通过执行以下操作来避免这些问题。Newer printers often avoid these problems by doing the following. - 将 TrueType 字体转换为边框字体，即泛型矢量字体。Converting a TrueType font into an outline font, which is a generic vector font. 许多不支持 TrueType 字体的打印机都支持分级显示字体。Many printers that do not support TrueType fonts, do support outline fonts. - 创建类似于 TrueType 字体的临时光栅字体。Creating a temporary raster font that looks just like a TrueType font. 打印机必须为文档使用的每个字号创建单独的临时光栅字体。The printer must create a separate temporary raster font for each font size that the document uses. 出于此原因，如果打印作业使用多种字体大小，则打印机使用的总内存可能会超过 TrueType 字体使用的内存量。For that reason, if a print job uses many font sizes, the total memory that the printer uses might be greater than what a TrueType font would use. - 将文档中的每个文本区域视为图形。Treating each text area in the document as a graphic. 如果某个设备需要打印的文档包含非常少的文本，则下载文本作为图形会比下载字体使用的打印机内存更少。If a device needs to print a document that contains very little text, downloading text as a graphic can use less printer memory than downloading a font. 将此类型的值用于以下目的：Use the values of this type for these purposes: - 作为的 属性的集合的成员， 这些值指示前面的哪些方法可用于特定打印机。As members of the collection, which is a property of , these values indicate which of the preceding techniques is available for a particular printer. 许多打印机支持多种技术。Many printers support more than one of these techniques. - 作为的属性的值 ，该值指示打印机以特定方式处理 TrueType 字体。As the value of the property of a , the value instructs the printer to handle TrueType fonts in a particular way. 对象的属性中从不使用**未知**值 。The **Unknown** value is never used in properties of objects. 永远不应将 属性设置为 "**未知**"。You should never set a property to **Unknown**. 如果某些其他 生成的应用程序创建*PrintTicket document*了一个将 TrueType 字体处理功能设置为无法识别的选项（即，在[打印架构](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=186397)中未定义的选项），则 应用程序中用该文档构造的对象将作为该属性的值**未知** 。If some other producing application has created a *PrintTicket document* that sets the TrueType font handling feature to an unrecognized option (that is, an option that is not defined in the [Print Schema](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=186397), then a object in your application that is constructed with that document will have **Unknown** as the value of the property. 尽管 和 类不能被继承，但你可以扩展[打印架构](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=186397)来识别在或类中不考虑的打印设备功能 。Although the and classes cannot be inherited, you can extend the [Print Schema](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=186397) to recognize print device features that are not accounted for in the or classes. 有关详细信息，请参阅[如何：扩展打印架构和创建新的打印系统类](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aa970573(v=vs.100))。For more information see [How to: Extend the Print Schema and Create New Print System Classes](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aa970573(v=vs.100)). ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何测试打印机的功能，以及如何配置打印作业以利用这些功能。The following example shows how to test a printer's capabilities and configure the print job to take advantage of them.
